show_name: Dr. Slump & Arale-chan Hello! Fushigi Jima (movie)
other_title: Dr. Slump & Arale-chan Hello! Strange Island
Dr. Slump & Arale-chan: Hello! Wonder Island
Dr. Slump: Arale-chan Hello! Fushigi Shima (Japanese)
怪博士與機器娃娃之Hello!不思議島 (Chinese (Taiwan))
Ｄｒ．スランプ アラレちゃん ハロー！不思議島 (Japanese)
plot: Professor Senbei finds a videotape of his deceased father providing instructions on how to create a love potion. The main ingredient is a tear of the evil Gyaasuka Daimao who lives at the Wonder Island. To retrieve it, Senbei takes Arale and Gatchan on a wacky adventure.
